name: @ggedde/spry-js
description: A simple JS Toolkit while being as lightweight as possible
author: ggedde

scripts.build-js:
bun build ./src/spry.ts --outdir ./docs --entry-naming spry.js --minify --format iife --banner='/*
* SpryJs 1.0.0
* https://ggedde.github.io/spry-js
*/'
scripts.watch-js:
bun build ./src/spry.ts --outdir ./docs --entry-naming spry.js --minify --watch --format iife --banner='/*
* SpryJs 1.0.0
* https://ggedde.github.io/spry-js
*/'
scripts.build: bun run build-esm; bun run build-js
scripts.dev: bun run watch-esm | bun run watch-js
